      • return_Smoothed_MLE

        public float return_Smoothed_MLE(java.lang.String t,
                        common.DocumentVector dv)
        mixingLambda*tf(t,d)/d-size + (1-mixingLambda)*cf(t)/col-size
        Parameters:
        t - The term under consideration
        dv - The document vector under consideration
        Returns:
        MLE of t in a document dv, smoothed with collection statistics

      • returnMLE_of_q_in_Q

        public float returnMLE_of_q_in_Q(java.lang.String[] qTerms,
                        java.lang.String qTerm)
        Returns MLE of a query term q in Q;

        P(w|Q) = tf(w,Q)/|Q|

        Parameters:
        qTerms - all query terms
        qTerm - query term under consideration
        Returns:
        MLE of qTerm in the query qTerms

      • IIDS

        public java.util.HashMap IIDS(common.TRECQuery query,
                     org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs topDocs)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        RM1

        Returns 'hashmap_PwGivenR' containing all terms of PR docs with weights IID Sampling

        P(w|R) = \sum{d\inD} {smoothedMLE(w,d)*smoothedMLE(Q,d)}

        Parameters:
        query - The query
        topDocs - Initial retrieved document list
        Returns:
        'hashmap_PwGivenR' containing all terms of PR docs with weights
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Based Language Model - Victor Lavrenko (SIGIR-2001)

      • RM3

        public java.util.HashMap RM3(common.TRECQuery query,
                    org.apache.lucene.search.TopDocs topDocs)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        RM3 P(w|R) = LAMBDA*RM1 + (1-LAMBDA)*P(w|Q)
        Parameters:
        query - The query
        topDocs - Initially retrieved document list
        Returns:
        hashmap_PwGivenR: containing numFeedbackTerms expansion terms with weights
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        Abdul Jaleel - TREC 2004 UMass Report
